title: CGTMSE Credit Guarantee
shortDesc: Collateral-free loans up to ‚Çπ2Cr for MSMEs. Government-backed credit guarantee.
longDesc: The Credit Guarantee Fund Trust for Micro and Small Enterprises (CGTMSE) enables MSMEs to avail collateral-free loans from member lending institutions. The guarantee cover is up to 85% for micro enterprises and 75% for small enterprises, making it the most accessible funding for Indian SMEs.

applicationSteps.title: Apply via BizCare
applicationSteps.description: We pre-fill your application using your profile data.

applicationSteps.title: Bank Partner Match
applicationSteps.description: We match you to the best CGTMSE member bank.

applicationSteps.title: Document Verification
applicationSteps.description: Bank reviews your docs ‚Äî typically 3‚Äì5 days.

applicationSteps.title: Loan Sanction
applicationSteps.description: Loan sanctioned. Disbursed in 7‚Äì14 working days.

title: PM Mudra Yojana ‚Äì Tarun
shortDesc: Loans up to ‚Çπ10L for small businesses under Pradhan Mantri MUDRA Yojana.
longDesc: MUDRA (Micro Units Development & Refinance Agency) Tarun category provides loans of ‚Çπ5L‚Äì‚Çπ10L for established micro enterprises looking to expand. No collateral, minimal documentation, processed through any PSB or scheduled commercial bank. One of India's most utilized MSME lending schemes.

applicationSteps.title: Select Bank
applicationSteps.description: Choose from 27 PSBs, RRBs, or MFIs near you.

applicationSteps.title: Fill Application
applicationSteps.description: Fill MUDRA application form with business details.

applicationSteps.title: Submit Docs
applicationSteps.description: Submit identity, business, and financial documents.

applicationSteps.title: Disbursement
applicationSteps.description: MUDRA card or direct credit to account in 7 days.

title: Startup India Seed Fund
shortDesc: ‚Çπ20L‚Äì‚Çπ50L seed funding for DPIIT-recognized startups at ideation/validation stage.
longDesc: The Startup India Seed Fund Scheme (SISFS) provides financial assistance to startups for proof of concept, prototype development, product trials, market entry, and commercialization. Funds are provided through DPIIT-empanelled incubators as grants or convertible debentures.

eligibilityCriteria.label: DPIIT Recognition
eligibilityCriteria.detail: Apply for DPIIT recognition first ‚Äî we can help

applicationSteps.title: DPIIT Recognition
applicationSteps.description: Get recognised on Startup India portal (BizCare assists).

applicationSteps.title: Apply to Incubator
applicationSteps.description: Apply to SISFS-empanelled incubator in your city.

applicationSteps.title: Pitch & Evaluation
applicationSteps.description: Present to incubator committee ‚Äî 30-day evaluation.

applicationSteps.title: Fund Disbursement
applicationSteps.description: Funds released in tranches based on milestones.

title: SBI SME Smart Score Loan
shortDesc: Hassle-free MSME loans up to ‚Çπ25L from SBI with 72-hour disbursement.
longDesc: SBI's SME Smart Score is a scoring-based MSME loan product offering quick turnaround. Loans are assessed purely on business performance and credit score ‚Äî minimal documentation, no personal guarantee required for scores above 60.

eligibilityCriteria.label: CIBIL Score ‚â• 700
eligibilityCriteria.detail: Your estimated score: 668. Improve with timely payments.

applicationSteps.title: Online Application
applicationSteps.description: Apply at SBI YONO or nearest branch with BizCare pre-fill.

applicationSteps.title: Smart Score Assessment
applicationSteps.description: SBI scores your business on 9 parameters automatically.

applicationSteps.title: Sanction Letter
applicationSteps.description: Sanction letter issued within 48 hours of complete docs.

applicationSteps.title: Disbursement
applicationSteps.description: Credited to account in 72 hours after sanction.

title: NSIC Subsidy Scheme
shortDesc: Raw material assistance and marketing support subsidies for manufacturing MSMEs.
longDesc: NSIC (National Small Industries Corporation) offers a suite of support schemes including raw material assistance (up to ‚Çπ5Cr credit line), marketing support, technology upgradation, and single point registration for government tenders ‚Äî all critical for manufacturing MSME growth.

applicationSteps.title: NSIC Registration
applicationSteps.description: Register as NSIC vendor ‚Äî BizCare handles paperwork.

applicationSteps.title: Raw Material Assessment
applicationSteps.description: NSIC assesses monthly raw material requirements.

applicationSteps.title: Credit Approval
applicationSteps.description: Supplier credit line approved within 30 days.

applicationSteps.title: Ongoing Procurement
applicationSteps.description: Buy raw materials via NSIC at subsidised interest.

title: StandUp India ‚Äì SC/ST/Women
shortDesc: ‚Çπ10L‚Äì‚Çπ1Cr for SC/ST entrepreneurs and women starting first-time businesses.
longDesc: StandUp India facilitates bank loans between ‚Çπ10 lakh and ‚Çπ1 crore to at least one Scheduled Caste or Scheduled Tribe borrower and at least one woman borrower per bank branch for setting up a greenfield enterprise in manufacturing, services, agri-allied activities, or trading sector.

applicationSteps.title: Eligibility Confirmation
applicationSteps.description: Confirm SC/ST or women founder status.

applicationSteps.title: Nodal Branch Application
applicationSteps.description: Apply at nearest scheduled bank branch.

applicationSteps.title: SIDBI Guarantee
applicationSteps.description: NCGTC covers 85% credit guarantee automatically.

applicationSteps.title: Loan Disbursement
applicationSteps.description: Loans disbursed within 15 working days.
